code: import axios from"axios";export var URL="https://api.realworld.io";export var feedArticles=function feedArticles(token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/feed"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var listArticles=function listArticles(token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var userByToken=function userByToken(token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/user"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
